verses.name: Psalms 149:1
verses.text: Praise ye the Lord. Sing unto the Lord a new song, and his praise in the congregation of saints.

verses.name: Psalms 149:2
verses.text: Let Israel rejoice in him that made him: let the children of Zion be joyful in their King.

verses.name: Psalms 149:3
verses.text: Let them praise his name in the dance: let them sing praises unto him with the timbrel and harp.

verses.name: Psalms 149:4
verses.text: For the Lord taketh pleasure in his people: he will beautify the meek with salvation.

verses.name: Psalms 149:5
verses.text: Let the saints be joyful in glory: let them sing aloud upon their beds.
